name: Charades With Friends !!!
description: Charades With Friends is a picture guessing game. It is an acting game in which one player acts out a word, song or movie, often by miming similar-sounding words, and the other players guess the word. The idea is to use physical rather than verbal language to convey the meaning to another party, taking a video, taking a picture or acting a sounds like clue and sending it to another player anywhere in the world. It is fun, it’s about connecting and sharing with friends, play it with a group, play with a random stranger or only with your best friend. Post Charades on Facebook or Twitter to get some help guessing the answer or show off just how silly your friends are.
